Read snippets into data frame.

Source: R/code.R
read_snippets.Rd

Read snippets into data frame.

read_snippets(input)

Arguments

input

(character) Either a file name or a character vector with with a snippet.

Value

File/Text with snippets parsed into data frame (tibble).

Examples


library(snippets)

file1 <- system.file("test1/html.snippets", package = "snippets")
read_snippets(file1)
#> # A tibble: 5 x 5
#>   name     no snippet    data            body                                   
#>   <chr> <int> <list>     <list>          <chr>                                  
#> 1 kbd       1 <glue [4]> <tibble [4 × 4… "\t<kbd>${0:Ctrl}</kbd>\n"             
#> 2 style     2 <glue [6]> <tibble [6 × 4… "\t<style>\n\t${1}\n\t</style>\n\t${0}…
#> 3 space     3 <glue [3]> <tibble [3 × 4… "\t&${1:nbsp};${0}\n"                  
#> 4 nbsp      4 <glue [3]> <tibble [3 × 4… "\t&${1:nbsp};${0}\n"                  
#> 5 font      5 <glue [2]> <tibble [2 × 4… "\t<font color = \"${1:red}\">${0}</fo…

file2 <- system.file("test2/html.snippets", package = "snippets")
read_snippets(file2)
#> # A tibble: 5 x 5
#>   name      no snippet    data            body                                  
#>   <chr>  <int> <list>     <list>          <chr>                                 
#> 1 kbd        1 <glue [4]> <tibble [4 × 4… "\t<kbd> ${0:Shift} </kbd>\n"         
#> 2 style      2 <glue [5]> <tibble [5 × 4… "\t<style>\n\t${1}\n\t</style>\n"     
#> 3 space2     3 <glue [3]> <tibble [3 × 4… "\t&${1:nbsp};${0}\n"                 
#> 4 nbsp       4 <glue [3]> <tibble [3 × 4… "\t&${1:nbsp};${0}\n"                 
#> 5 font       5 <glue [2]> <tibble [2 × 4… "\t<font color = \"${1:red}\">${0}</f…

file3 <- path_to_snippets_files_of_pkg("snippets")[1]
read_snippets(file3)
#> # A tibble: 183 x 5
#>    name           no snippet   data       body                                  
#>    <chr>       <int> <list>    <list>     <chr>                                 
#>  1 help            1 <glue [2… <tibble [… "\t${0}<!-- Help/Documentation snippe…
#>  2 ?               2 <glue [5… <tibble [… "\t```{r, eval=FALSE}\n\t?${0}\n\t```…
#>  3 ???             3 <glue [5… <tibble [… "\t```{r, eval=FALSE}\n\t???${0}\n\t`…
#>  4 compare-r-…     4 <glue [5… <tibble [… "\t```{r, eval=FALSE}\n\tcompare-r-sy…
#>  5 help-desc       5 <glue [5… <tibble [… "\t```{r, eval=FALSE}\n\thelp-desc${0…
#>  6 help-data-…     6 <glue [1… <tibble [… "\t<!--\n\tThe abbreviations (used in…
#>  7 help-bookd…     7 <glue [5… <tibble [… "\t${0}<!-- START: Snippets for Bookd…
#>  8 eq              8 <glue [1… <tibble [… "\t<!-- Equation ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~…
#>  9 exr             9 <glue [5… <tibble [… "\t```{exercise, ${1:exercise-ID}, ec…
#> 10 exm            10 <glue [5… <tibble [… "\t```{example, ${1:exercise-ID}, ech…
#> # … with 173 more rows


text <- (
'
snippet space
	&${1:nbsp};${0}

snippet nbsp
	&${1:nbsp};${0}
'
snippet space
	&${1:nbsp};${0}

snippet nbsp
	&${1:nbsp};${0}
')

read_snippets(text)
#> # A tibble: 2 x 5
#>   name     no snippet    data             body                 
#>   <chr> <int> <list>     <list>           <chr>                
#> 1 space     1 <glue [4]> <tibble [4 × 4]> "\t&${1:nbsp};${0}\n"
#> 2 nbsp      2 <glue [2]> <tibble [2 × 4]> "\t&${1:nbsp};${0}"
